snippet.title: David. // is a game.
snippet.description:
http://fermentergames.com/david
http://store.steampowered.com/app/346180
https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/david./id777413889
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.fermentergames.david
http://facebook.com/DavidIsAGame

-

Out now on iOS, Android, Windows, and Mac.

-

David. // is a game. A game about physics and enemies. A game about struggles and life. This game is designed to be difficult.

I poured myself into developing this game for nights and nights and nights. It's almost tough to share. I hope it feels strangely personal.
